fixes.solution_explanation: Translated the row-level Tableau IF/OR check on [INSTRUMENT_TYPE] into a DAX calculated column. Uses a VAR to capture 'INSTRUMENT_TYPE' and returns 1 when it matches any of the listed instrument type strings, otherwise 0.
